question: Which of the following inscription is associated with Satakarni-II?
option4: An inscription of the gateway of Sanchi
answer: An inscription of the gateway of Sanchi
explanation:
• Satakarni-II mentioned in an inscription of the gateway of Sanchi, the Yugapurana and in few coins.
  • Naneghat inscription of Naganika mentions about Satakarni-I.
  • Nasik Inscription of Gautami Balasri is about Gautamiputra Satakarni.
